short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your life and gain inner peace, through a space entirely designed for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: yourSpace is a way to organize your busy life, through a easy-to-use interface and through effective tools you can use to maximize productivity. Within these tools, there is a "todo list", where you can plan the tasks you need to accomplish. Through a minimalistic interface which gives you a feeling of satisfaction every time you complete a task, you will be kept on track and committed to completing your goals. There is also a "productivity mode", where you can effectively block out any websites that might be a distraction to you. There's also a space where you can self-meditate through controlled breathing or through relaxing music. And, whenever you open a new tab, a motivational quote, with a variety of different backgrounds, will keep you motivated throughout your daily tasks. yourSpace isn't just a way to be more productive, it's a way to gain inner peace and be the amazing person you were meant to be.
